item.title: Introduction
item.description: Multi-pool Swaps # After implementing cross-tick swaps, we’ve got really close to real Uniswap V3 swaps. One significant limitation of our implementation is that it allows only swaps within a poolâ€“if there’s no pool for a swap of tokens, then swapping between these tokens is not possible. This is not so in Uniswap since it allows multi-pool swaps. In this chapter, we’re going to add multi-pool swaps to our implementation.
